title: Sceptre 24" Professional Thin 75Hz 1080p LED Monitor 2x HDMI VGA Build-in Speakers, Machine Black (E248W-19203R Series)
description: Whether you are a gamer or a movie buff, the Sceptre E248W-19203R monitor is the way to go. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) delivers stunning color and picture detail on a 22 inch screen. A 5 millisecond response time displays action sequences with the highest Degree of clarity. Enjoy HDMI, and VGA inputs to connect all video and gaming devices.
